page.title:
Recommended Principles in Definition of Sustainability
Recommended Principles in Definition of
Sustainability

cell.tabletext:
Protect environment and improve natural resources for future generations.
Protect environment and
improve natural resources for
future generations.

Improve economic performance and quality of life for individuals.
Improve economic performance
and quality of life for individuals.

Preserve the value of human and man-made capital for future generations.

and man-made capital for future
generations.
